lyrics:

Mi amore

I'm lost into loving you
(Ai-ae)
Go, go, go
Mi amor-amor-amore

Amor-amor-amore
Our love will never end
Fly away with me my angel
From heaven sent
Amor-amor-amore
Take my heart, mi amore

Ai-ae
(Go, go, go)
(Go, go, go)
Ohh

Our love will never end
